CHAT.comment: QUANTA COMPUTER, INC., ET AL., Petitioners v. LG ELECTRONICS, INC.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:16 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MAUREEN E. MAHONEY ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS G. HUNGAR ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CARTER G. PHILLIPS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
(Whereupon, at 11:16 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
